com.github.wuic.engine.core
Class MemoryMapCacheEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.engine.Engine
      com.github.wuic.engine.HeadEngine
          com.github.wuic.engine.core.AbstractCacheEngine
              com.github.wuic.engine.core.ScheduledCacheEngine
                  com.github.wuic.engine.core.MemoryMapCacheEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Engine>, Runnable
@EngineService(injectDefaultToWorkflow=true,
               isCoreEngine=true)
public class MemoryMapCacheEngine
extends ScheduledCacheEngine

This engine reads from a Map kept in memory the nuts associated to a workflow to be processed.

Since:
0.4.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Builds a new engine.

Parameters:
work - if cache should be activated or not
timeToLiveSeconds - the time this cache could live
bestEffort - enable best effort mode or not
